data.name: Night Racer - Ultimate Car Pack
data.detailed_description:
You'll get a total of 5 exclusive cars post launch. Each car will drop every 2 weeks after release. With every update the cars will automatically be unlocked for you. All the cars come with their own unique skins.
The 5 Cars are
- The Muscle
- The Vintage Vindicator
- The Raging Bull
- The Hatch
- The Truck
data.about_the_game:
You'll get a total of 5 exclusive cars post launch. Each car will drop every 2 weeks after release. With every update the cars will automatically be unlocked for you. All the cars come with their own unique skins.
The 5 Cars are

- The Raging Bull

data.short_description: Get access to 5 exclusive cars post launch. Each car will be dropping every 2 weeks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k or greater, 3.3ghz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / 2060super or greater

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
